title: Food/Restaurant Review Mobile App
content: As someone who really likes food. It would be awesome to have a personal app that let me record my own reviews and ratings of the food I have tried (like a personal note). However, there isn't an app that allows user to do that (only those with online review), so I decided to create one. This app is built with Flutter and Dart.

title: Web-based Python Mental Health Chatbot (FYP)
content: This is a web-based mental health chatbot developed in Python (my final year project in university). This chatbot offers a safe space for mental health support, using natural language processing and machine learning to engage in meaningful conversations. It aims to provide mental health education and help users to manage stress. The functionalities included are chatting, tests, exercises, sos, journalling, and more. Built with Python Flask.
tag: Python, Flask, SQLAlchemy, Chatbot, Machine Learning

title: University Assignments
content: During my university years, I have completed many assignments and projects. I have uploaded most of them to GitHub. Ranging from Data Science, Machine Learning, Database, Computer Vision and more. Check out more in my GitHub!
tag: Python, Java, C++, Assembly, LabView, R, Rust, SQL
